sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=b.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER B
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='0'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='2'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='3'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='4'
1=1
B.ZC_SU_STATUS = #zcText0#
B.IS_EXPORTED = #zcText0#
B.LOGIN_NAME = #extField1#
ROWNUM<6 and B.ZC_SU_STATUS='2' ORDER BY B.ZC_AUDIT_DATE DESC
ROWNUM<6 and B.ZC_SU_STATUS='0' ORDER BY B.ZC_REG_DATE DESC
B.ZC_SU_CODE like 'temp_%'

SELECT B.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=b.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER B WHERE ZC_SU_CODE=#executor#
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='0'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='2'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='3'
1=1

SELECT B.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=B.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER B WHERE 1=1
B.ZC_SU_CODE=#pmAdjustCodeList[]#
select * from zc_b_supplier s order by s.zc_su_name

select B.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=B.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL from ZC_B_SUPPLIER B where B.ZC_SU_STATUS = '2' and B.ZC_SU_CODE in (select ZC_SU_CODE from ZC_B_MER_PRICE where ZC_B_MER_PRICE.ZC_MER_CODE = #value#) order by B.ZC_SU_NAME

SELECT B.ZC_SU_CODE, B.ZC_SU_NAME, B.ZC_SU_LINKMAN, B.ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, B.ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, B.ZC_SU_BANK_NAME FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER B
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='0'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='2'
B.ZC_SU_STATUS='3'
1=1
B.ZC_SU_CODE = #executor#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_B_SUPPLIER p WHERE p.ZC_SU_CODE=#VALUE#
sqlMap.select: select p.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=p.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL from ZC_B_SUPPLIER p WHERE p.ZC_SU_CODE=#VALUE#
select p.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=p.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL from ZC_B_SUPPLIER p WHERE p.ZC_SU_NAME=#VALUE#
select p.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=p.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL from ZC_B_SUPPLIER p WHERE p.LOGIN_NAME=#VALUE#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_B_SUPPLIER( ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_ASSESS_CODE, ZC_SU_ADDR, ZC_POST_CODE, ZC_ASSESS_DATE, ZC_SU_STATUS, SUPPLIER_TYPE, ZC_IS_ZXQY, ZC_IS_XYSU, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_CORP_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, EMAIL, ESTABLISH_DATE, LINK_MAN_PHONE, LINK_MAN_MOBILE, FAX, SCALE, LOGIN_NAME, URL, DESCRIPTION, LEGAL_PERSON, LEGAL_PERSON_ADDR, LEGAL_PERSON_ID_CARD, LEGAL_CARD_TYPE, LEGAL_PERSON_FAX, LEGAL_PERSON_MOBILE, LEGAL_PERSON_TEL, REG_CAPITAL, MAIN_BUSINESSES, IS_EXPORTED, ZC_LICENSE_ID, ZC_LICENSE_DATE_START, ZC_LICENSE_DATE_END, STATE_TAX_REG_ID, STATE_TAX_REG_DATE, LOCAL_TAX_REG_ID, LOCAL_TAX_REG_DATE, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE, ZC_SUPPLIER_TYPE, ZC_SUPPLIER_KIND, ZC_CREAT_DATE, ZC_AUDIT_DATE, XYFILE, XYFILE_BLOBID ) values( #code# ,#name# ,#linkMan# ,#phone# ,#operator# ,#address# ,#zipCode# ,#operDate:DATE# ,#status# ,#supplierType# ,#isZxqy# ,#isXysu# ,#gnw# ,#snw# ,#corpCode# ,#accCode# ,#bankCode# ,#bankName# ,#email# ,#establishDate# ,#linkManPhone# ,#linkManMobile# ,#fax# ,#scale# ,#loginName# ,#url# ,#description# ,#legalPerson# ,#legalPersonAddr# ,#legalPersonIDCard# ,#legalCardType# ,#legalPersonFax# ,#legalPersonMobile# ,#legalPersonTel# ,#regCapital# ,#mainBusinesses# ,#isExported# ,#licenseId# ,#licenseTimeStart# ,#licenseTimeEnd# ,#stateTaxRegId# ,#stateTaxRegDate# ,#localTaxRegId# ,#localTaxRegDate# ,#zcCatalogueCode# ,#zcSupplierType# ,#zcSupplierKind# ,#zcCreateDate# ,#zcAuditDate# ,#xyFile# ,#xyFileBlobID# )
sqlMap.update:
update ZC_B_SUPPLIER set ZC_SU_CODE=#code#, ZC_SU_NAME=#name#, ZC_SU_LINKMAN=#linkMan#, ZC_SU_TEL=#phone#, ZC_ASSESS_CODE=#operator#, ZC_SU_ADDR=#address#, ZC_POST_CODE=#zipCode#, ZC_ASSESS_DATE=#operDate#, ZC_SU_STATUS=#status#, ZC_IS_ZXQY=#isZxqy#, ZC_IS_XYSU=#isXysu#, ZC_GNW=#gnw#, ZC_SNW=#snw#, ZC_CORP_CODE=#corpCode#, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE=#accCode#, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE=#bankCode#, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME=#bankName#, EMAIL=#email#, SUPPLIER_TYPE=#supplierType#, ESTABLISH_DATE=#establishDate#, LINK_MAN_PHONE=#linkManPhone#, LINK_MAN_MOBILE=#linkManMobile#, FAX=#fax#, SCALE=#scale#, LOGIN_NAME=#loginName#, URL=#url#, DESCRIPTION=#description#, LEGAL_PERSON=#legalPerson#, LEGAL_PERSON_ADDR=#legalPersonAddr#, LEGAL_PERSON_ID_CARD=#legalPersonIDCard#, LEGAL_CARD_TYPE=#legalCardType#, LEGAL_PERSON_FAX=#legalPersonFax#, LEGAL_PERSON_MOBILE=#legalPersonMobile#, LEGAL_PERSON_TEL=#legalPersonTel#, REG_CAPITAL=#regCapital#, MAIN_BUSINESSES=#mainBusinesses#, IS_EXPORTED=#isExported#, ZC_LICENSE_ID=#licenseId#, ZC_LICENSE_DATE_START=#licenseTimeStart#, ZC_LICENSE_DATE_END=#licenseTimeEnd#, STATE_TAX_REG_ID=#stateTaxRegId#, STATE_TAX_REG_DATE=#stateTaxRegDate#, LOCAL_TAX_REG_ID=#localTaxRegId#, LOCAL_TAX_REG_DATE=#localTaxRegDate#, ZC_CATALOGUE_CODE=#zcCatalogueCode#, ZC_SUPPLIER_TYPE=#zcSupplierType#, ZC_SUPPLIER_KIND=#zcSupplierKind#, XYFILE=#xyFile#, XYFILE_BLOBID=#xyFileBlobID# where
ZC_SU_CODE=#oldCode#
ZC_SU_CODE=#code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.*,(select CA_SERIAL from as_emp where emp_code=B.zc_su_code) as CA_SERIAL FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER B,ZC_B_MER_PRICE M WHERE B.ZC_SU_CODE=M.ZC_SU_CODE AND B.ZC_SU_STATUS=#zcText0# AND M.ZC_MER_CODE=#zcText1# AND M.ZC_BRA_CODE=#zcText2#
select * from (select * from ZC_B_MER_DISCOUNT dis where #zcText3# between dis.ZC_TREATY_LOWER_LIMIT and dis.ZC_TREATY_UPPER_LIMIT) t where t.ZC_SU_CODE=#zcText4# and t.ZC_MER_CODE=#zcText1#

SELECT SUP.LINK_MAN_MOBILE, SUP.ZC_SU_CODE, SUP.ZC_SU_NAME, SUP.ZC_SU_ADDR, SUP.ZC_SU_LINKMAN, MER.ZC_MER_M_PRICE * (100 - NVL(DIS.ZC_TREATY_DISCOUNT_RATE, 0)) / 100 AS PRICE, NVL(DIS.ZC_TREATY_DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) AS ZC_TREATY_DISCOUNT_RATE, (SELECT CA_SERIAL FROM AS_EMP WHERE EMP_CODE = SUP.ZC_SU_CODE) AS CA_SERIAL FROM ZC_B_SUPPLIER SUP, ZC_B_MERCHANDISE MER, ZC_B_MER_DISCOUNT DIS WHERE SUP.ZC_SU_CODE = DIS.ZC_SU_CODE AND MER.ZC_MER_CODE = DIS.ZC_MER_CODE AND MER.ZC_MER_CODE = #zcText1# AND SUP.ZC_SU_STATUS = #zcText0# AND MER.ZC_MER_STATUS = 'exec' AND #zcText3# BETWEEN DIS.ZC_TREATY_LOWER_LIMIT AND DIS.ZC_TREATY_UPPER_LIMIT

select count(*) as COUNT_NUM from ZC_B_SUPPLIER
ZC_SU_STATUS = #status#

select ZC_B_SUPPLIER.*,'' as CA_SERIAL from ZC_B_SUPPLIER
ZC_SU_STATUS = #status#
$orders[]$
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZC_B_SUPPLIER S SET S.ZC_AUDIT_DATE = #auditDate#, S.ZC_SU_STATUS = '2' WHERE S.ZC_SU_CODE = #code#
UPDATE ZC_B_SUPPLIER S SET S.ZC_AUDIT_DATE = #auditDate#, S.ZC_SU_STATUS = #status# WHERE S.ZC_SU_CODE = #code#
sqlMap.select:
select * from ZC_B_SUPPLIER s where s.ZC_SU_STATUS ='2'
s.zc_su_code not in ($zcText4$)
order by s.ZC_SU_CODE
select ZC_SU_CODE,ZC_SU_NAME,ZC_SU_LINKMAN from ZC_B_SUPPLIER s where s.ZC_SU_STATUS ='2' order by s.ZC_SU_CODE
select t.email from zc_b_supplier t where t.zc_su_code=#value# and email is not null
